name: Sudoku Scapes
description:
Can you solve the sudoku puzzles? Even with unlimited tries it's a challenge!

SudokuScapes is the best sudoku game for both beginners and advanced players. It can help you keep your mind active and pass your free time. This number twist of a sudoku game is tremendous brain challenging fun. You’ll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game!

- Escape and stimulate your mind by visiting the beautiful destinations of SudokuScapes!
- Exercise your brain, logical thinking and memory.
- It's a perfect fit for fans of number puzzles.

Features:
- 7 beautiful themes, you can pick anyone you like
- Weekly ranking to see who is the best
- Contain all tools you need like Pencil, Undo, Eraser..
- Highlight duplicates to avoid repeating numbers in a row, column and block

Start your brain practice now!
